entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Terrace Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:31 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -13.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Terrace Bay 5:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -13.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 69 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -17.8°C
Wind: NNW 14 km/h gust 31 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow and local blowing snow ending late this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 11. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of flurries. High minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
